alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:16PM CST until March 05 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Henderson County in west central Illinois... Des Moines County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 816 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Union to near Lowell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Danville and Middletown around 825 PM CST. Mediapolis and Iowa Army Ammunition Plant around 830 PM CST. West Burlington around 835 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Burlington, Carman, Gulf Port, Gladstone and Stronghurst. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern Iowa.
